title: Unexpected `You are already on a Vertx context` warning
body:
### Describe the bug

I'm testing an application, and I've got

```
2024-01-19 18:24:17,052 INFO  [io.quarkus] (main) security-openid-connect-plugin 1.0.0-SNAPSHOT on JVM (powered by Quarkus 999-SNAPSHOT) started in 0.963s. Listening on: http://0.0.0.0:8080
2024-01-19 18:24:17,055 INFO  [io.quarkus] (main) Profile prod activated. 
2024-01-19 18:24:17,055 INFO  [io.quarkus] (main) Installed features: [cdi, oidc, resteasy-reactive, security, smallrye-context-propagation, smallrye-openapi, vertx]
2024-01-19 18:25:10,138 WARN  [io.ver.cor.imp.VertxImpl] (vert.x-eventloop-thread-8) You're already on a Vert.x context, are you sure you want to create a new Vertx instance?
```

I'll try to get a reproducer next week

### Expected behavior

_No response_

### Actual behavior

_No response_
